moves.2. f4: The King's Gambit, a move that is risky but always leads to excitement!
moves.2... Bc5: Maillard declines the gambit and develops his B aggressively.
moves.3. fxe5: Premature. 3 N-KB3 should precede this move, so as to prevent...
moves.4... Qxe4#: Maillard wastes no time. The players have barely sat down, and it's game over!
